links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for two-way infinite sequences
maple: M := Matrix(23, (i,j)-> if (i=j-1) or (j=1 and member(i, [2, 4, 5, 11, 12, 18, 19, 21])) then 1 elif j=1 and member(i, [6, 7, 9, 14, 16, 17, 23]) then -1 else 0 fi); a := n -> (M^(n))[1,1]; seq (a(n), n=0..70); - _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 25 2008
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
